title: Cranberry pecan upside-down cake
ingredients: ['150g dark brown soft sugar', '75g butter', '120g cranberries', '60g chopped pecans', '110g butter, room temperature', '150g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250ml soured cream', '200g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
